column4: do you think it's worth switching to 64 bit version of ubuntu, for everyday use, even if I got less than 4GB, by everyday use I mean that I'm not using any other OS only Linux for everything. Is there any cons I should be aware except flash and java ?
media codecs? if you use the win32 codecs with mplayer I don't think you'll be able to use them under 64bit
I'm not saying they don't - just that win32 implies they're 32bit codecs
